title: Letterhead, The Peoples Telephone Corporation, Butler, Pennsylvania, late 20th century
title_raw: The Peoples Telephone Corporation, Butler, Pennsylvania
medium: Letterpress: black ink on white wove paper
markings:
Wartermark: Beaver Bond Rag Content
Printed logo within double ringed circle, lower left corner: Peoples Telephone Co. / Incorporated 1925  encircling  image of telephone
inscribed: Printed logo, lower left: image of telephone with imprinted text " Peoples Telephone Co. / Incorporated 1925" (imprinted within double circles); address as follows: "218 South Washington Street. Butler, Pennsylvania 16001 / Area Code 412/ Telephone 287-5751"; upper left:" Zenno F. Henninger/President / S.E. Phillips/Vice President/General Manager"
description: Peoples Telephone Corporation name printed across top of sheet above address.  Embossed logo, upper right: P.T. with image of telephone between letters.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, The Peoples Telephone Corporation, Butler, Pennsylvania, late 20th century. Letterpress: black ink on white wove paper. 
Gift of Thomas F. O'Malley. 1999-59-7
